# tacApp

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of tacApp is to help you track change in the production capacity of power plants
of companies in the power sector.

## Installation

You can install the development version of tacApp from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("2DegreesInvesting/tacApp")
```

## Example

```{r example}
library(tacApp)

if (interactive()) {
  run_app()
}
```
